code_quality.description: Maintain TypeScript strict mode, minimize use of 'any' types

architecture.description: Preserve core architecture: Durable Objects for state, Svelte 5 runes for reactivity

dependencies.description: Only add dependencies when strictly necessary, always check for vulnerabilities

testing.description: Manually test terminal functionality and WebSocket connections

documentation.description: Keep README.md and CLAUDE.md in sync with changes

git_status_clean.description: Ensure no untracked files that should be ignored

no_console_logs.description: Warn on console.log statements in production code

no_secrets.description: Block commits containing API keys or secrets

iteration_limits.description: Keep iterations small and focused on single stories
